name: Farigiraf
description: The Long Neck Pokémon. Now that the brain waves from the head and tail are synced up, the psychic power of this Pokémon is 10 times stronger than Girafarig’s.

abilities.name: Cud Chew
abilities.description: After consuming a berry, on the following turn, this Pokémon may consume the berry a second time, thereafter consuming it permanently.

abilities.name: Armor Tail
abilities.description: While this Pokémon is out, hostile Pokémon within sight cannot use moves that require a bonus action to use.

abilities.name: Sap Sipper
abilities.description: This Pokémon takes no damage from grass-type attacks. If hit by a grass type move, it takes no damage and instead absorbs the energy, granting advantage on its next attack.
